alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ITASCA, NORTHERN AITKIN, CENTRAL CASS AND NORTHEASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Grand Rapids, to near Walker, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cohasset and Pokegama Lake around 245 PM CDT. Hill City around 300 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hackensack and Backus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca
